name: TriggerPipeline
description: Build and Release Management task to trigger a Azure DevOps release or build pipeline.
author: Maik van der Gaag

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure DevOps service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure DevOps Organization service connection.

inputs.name: project
inputs.label: Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of the team project where the pipeline resides.

inputs.name: buildDefinition
inputs.label: Build Definition
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of the Build to trigger.

inputs.name: releaseDefinition
inputs.label: Release Definition
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of the Release to trigger.

inputs.name: Branch
inputs.label: Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the branch to build. When kept empty, the default branch is used.

inputs.name: BuildNumber
inputs.label: Build Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The succeeded build number to release the primary artifact. When kept empty, the latest version is used.

inputs.name: Stages
inputs.label: Stages (, separated)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The stages you would like to trigger separated by : ,

inputs.name: buildapiversion
inputs.label: Build - API Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the API Version that will be used for the build APIs.

inputs.name: releaseapiversion
inputs.label: Release - API Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the API Version that will be for the Release APIs.

inputs.name: VariableInput
inputs.label: Release variable json
inputs.helpMarkDown: A json value representing the variables example: {'name' : 'test', 'newValue' : 'test'}
